Articles.Content: Just joined the forum nice to be here and i went to edit avatar setting but there doesnt seem to be any way for me to upload my pic ?

Hello ThePixeledFox, and welcome to the forums!

There is an anti-spam system which requires you to have three or five moderator approved posts before you can access profile editing features.

Hope you find the community here informative and engaging.

Happy landings!

Hi ThePixeledFox !

Have a nice space adventure
